content.text: Match ends, Girona 1, Recreativo 1.
Second Half ends, Girona 1, Recreativo 1.
Attempt missed. Iván López (Girona) left footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the right.
Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Jorge.
Substitution, Girona. Jordi Matamala replaces Eloi Amagat.
Attempt missed. Álvaro Antón (Recreativo) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right.
Attempt saved. Jandro (Girona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Jorge Morcillo (Recreativo) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Jorge Morcillo (Recreativo).
Felipe (Girona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Hernán Menosse.
Miguel Linares (Recreativo) hits the bar with a left footed shot from outside the box.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Iván López (Girona) because of an injury.
Substitution, Recreativo. Álvaro Antón replaces Manuel Arana.
Richy (Girona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Richy (Girona).
Jorge (Recreativo) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Foul by Juan Antonio Zamora (Recreativo).
David García (Girona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Foul by Ángel Montoro (Recreativo).
Jandro (Girona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Girona. Juanlu Hens replaces Jofre.
Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Jesús Cabrero.
Attempt saved. Jofre (Girona) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jandro with a through ball.
Foul by Juan Antonio Zamora (Recreativo).
David Timor (Girona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Jofre (Girona) hits the bar with a left footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Iván López.
Foul by Ángel Montoro (Recreativo).
Eloi Amagat (Girona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Álvaro Vega.
Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Iván López.
Goal!  Girona 1, Recreativo 1. Miguel Linares (Recreativo) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Manuel Arana with a headed pass.
Foul by Juan Antonio Zamora (Recreativo).
David Timor (Girona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Recreativo. Juan Antonio Zamora replaces David Córcoles because of an injury.
Delay in match David Córcoles (Recreativo) because of an injury.
Attempt saved. Manuel Arana (Recreativo) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jesús Vázquez.
Offside, Girona. Migue tries a through ball, but Felipe is caught offside.
Substitution, Recreativo. Álvaro Vega replaces Fernando Vega.
Ángel Montoro (Recreativo) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Richy (Girona).
Offside, Girona. Jofre tries a through ball, but Felipe is caught offside.
Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Jesús Cabrero.
Corner,  Girona. Conceded by Jorge Morcillo.
Attempt missed. Jorge (Recreativo) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Miguel Linares.
Attempt missed. Richy (Girona) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left.
Corner,  Recreativo. Conceded by Iván López.
Attempt blocked. Luis Gallegos (Recreativo) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jorge.
Second Half begins Girona 1, Recreativo 0.
First Half ends, Girona 1, Recreativo 0.
